about_the_game:
One Deck, 19 Poker Hands, 172 Functional Cards, 21 Boosters, 39 Villains, 2 Gameplay Mechanics, and a flexible variety of strategy combinations—endless possibilities!

-Joker Ascent

Multiple Villain debuffs stack and activate, with Dark Deck that negates player actions, adding more strategy and challenge.

-Jack&Joker

Combine the strategy of Joker and Poker Hands with classic Yatzy

Draw and Hold Playing Cards,match target Poker Hands to defeat Villains.

-PvP

Save your favorite seed in Joker Ascent, duel with friends or strangers, and win rewards!

-Ability Deck

Upgrading ability decks allows you to carry more resources, gain powerful special abilities, and unlock certain Joker cards.

-Cards

120 Joker cards with unique abilities

22 Tarot cards that argument playing cards

18 Spell cards that boost Hand and Joker cards

12 Zodiac cards that upgrade Poker Hands with 1-3 levels

-Boosters

5 Empowerments and 7 Sigils provide bonus effects to Playing Cards and Jokers

12 Perks grant special buffs in [Joker Ascent]

Simple rules make it easy,but hard to master.

A wealth of elements and possibilities await your discovery!

name: Joker Order: Deckbuilding

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Duel using Poker and Jokers against Villains with Dark Deck. Unique Playing Card-Based Yatzy gameplay,Draw and Match Poker Hands to defeat Villains with different debuffs. More items and possibilities await your discovery.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
